awards.title: 65th Lindau Nobel Laureate Meeting
awards.description: I was selected to participate as a young scientist in the "65th Lindau Nobel Laureate Meeting. Interdisciplinary: Physiology/Medicine, Physics, Chemistry". ICREA (Catalan Institution for Research and Advanced Studies) nominated my application. A record number of 70 Nobel laureates and 672 young scientists from 89 countries participated in the 65th Lindau Nobel Laureate Meeting.

awards.title: Max Planck-Prince of Asturias Award Mobility Grant
awards.description: On October 25, 2013, the Max-Planck-Gesellschaft received the Prince of Asturias Award in recognition of its international cooperation. The Max-Planck-Gesellschaft doubled the €50,000 prize money from its own funds and established a grant programme to fund research residencies for outstanding doctoral students and postdocs from Spain at a Max Planck Institute.
